com.stephengware.java.ai.planning.logic

Class Variable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stephengware.java.ai.planning.logic.Term
      • com.stephengware.java.ai.planning.logic.Variable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formula, java.lang.Comparable<Formula>

    public class Variable
extends Term
    A variable represents a placeholder for a constant whose value is not yet known.
    Author:
    Stephen G. Ware
